title: Father's Day Special with JC Newman
itunes:title: Father's Day Special with JC Newman
description: Celebrating Father's Day weekend with Bobby Newman from J.C. Newman Cigar Company, and the hottest new thing to happen to cigars since the match! His son Dawson Newman as we light up the flavorful Julius Caeser to celebrate this special weekend.
